title: President of Nicaragua
summary: The president of Nicaragua (Spanish: Presidente de Nicaragua), officially known as the President of the Republic of Nicaragua (Spanish: Presidente de la Rep√∫blica de Nicaragua), is the head of state and head of government of Nicaragua. The office was created in the Constitution of 1854. From 1825 until the Constitution of 1838, the head of state of Nicaragua was styled simply as Head of State (Jefe de Estado), and from 1838 to 1854 as Supreme Director (Supremo Director).
